title: JSW MG Motor retail sales fall 8% to 4,588 units in September
description: JSW MG Motor India reported an 8% year-on-year decline in retail sales for September, selling 4,588 units compared to 5,003 units in the same month last year. Notably, new energy vehicles (NEVs) made up 49% of total sales. The company plans to transition to the Vaahan Portal starting October 2024, marking a step in the maturation of its sales reporting.
